control.controller
Class CoordinatorController

java.lang.Object
  control.controller.GeneralUserController
      control.controller.RegisteredUserController
          control.controller.AcademicStaffController
              control.controller.CoordinatorController

public class CoordinatorController
extends AcademicStaffController

The CoordinatorController class takes care of all the actions performed by the co-ordinator. This class extends from AcademicStaffController and thus have all the functions of the AcademicStaff.

See Also:
AcademicStaff, Seminar, Group, Publication

Method Detail

publishSeminar

public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> publishSeminar(int seminarID)
This method is used to published a seminar from the list of added seminar. The method checks whether the input seminarID exist, if it do, it published the seminar to the groupMember.

Parameters:
seminarID: - The id of the seminar to be published
Returns:
emailSet: If the seminar exist, return the group member email null: If the seminarId does not exist
See Also:
Group, Seminar, Repository
